title: Unable to download admission order for cet counselling?
content:
I'm not sure where else to ask, but we've paid the fee, and yet are unable to access the admission order. Have anyone else gotten it? If so, what to do?

I've tried logging in the link, it doesnt show anything.

comments.body: Check kea website they have given seperate link for admission order. It won't show if you use the original option entry link. And make sure the "balance" in the allotment details is 0 in the option entry portal.
